title: Diamond Vanki Necklace Pendant: A Timeless Masterpiece
materials: 18K Yellow Gold. Setting: Pave setting. Adorned with ethically sourced brilliant-cut diamonds. Carat weight: Approximate total diamond weight of 1.5 carats. Clarity: VS. Color: GH. Features a Hyderabadi Polish for superior luster and durability.
features: This exquisitely crafted vanki (armlet) design pendant is meticulously set with sparkling diamonds. The design draws inspiration from traditional South Indian armlets but modernized for versatile wear as a pendant. Features a floral motif at the top and cascading teardrop-shaped elements. The pave setting ensures maximum brilliance, creating a dazzling display of light and sparkle. The intricate filigree detailing in the gold adds depth and texture to the design.
colors: Primary Color: Yellow Gold. Gemstone Color: White (Diamonds).
occasions: and special occasions. Equally suitable for formal gatherings and festive celebrations. Can be worn as a statement piece for parties.
description: A stunning blend of tradition and modernity. The vanki design is culturally significant, symbolizing prosperity and good fortune. The high-quality diamonds and expert craftsmanship ensure that this piece is a timeless investment. Its versatility allows you to wear it with both traditional and contemporary outfits, making it a valuable addition to any jewelry collection.
